barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin's draft of a bill to establish a seminary of learning, [October 11 1827?].
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: The date of this document cannot be definitely fixed. The order for the establishment of the Ayuntamiento of San Felipe de Austin was issued by the Governor on November 17, 1827, and promulgated by the political chief of Bexar on December 11 The election was held and the ayuntamiento organized February 10, 1828. Article 3 of this document indicates that it was written before the establishment of the ayuntamiento. Between October 11 and November 8, 1827, Austin made, in Saltillo a series of suggestions to the Governor for legislation. This document was most probably written about that time, but it is not certain that it was presented to the Governor. Compare it with a bill drawn April 30, 1831,

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin's draft of a bill to establish a seminary of learning, [October 11 1827?].*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[October 11, 1827?]*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila y Texas*/location_mentioned* have thought proper to decree as follows—*/p*
*p*Considering Education as the basis of good morals of good order and of the Republican System of Govt, and seeing the necessity there is for the establishment of a *location_mentioned*Seminary */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*at the Town of San Felipe de Austin */location_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*for the purpose of instructing the *person_mentioned*Children of the new Colonists*/person_mentioned* who have emigrated to that point in the *location_mentioned*Spanish*/location_mentioned* language, Therefore it is decreed*/p*
*p*1—That a *location_mentioned*Seminary of learning*/location_mentioned* shall be established at the said Town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* in which shall be taught the various branches of Education*/p*
*p*2. The Said *location_mentioned*Seminary */location_mentioned*shall be under the direction of *person_mentioned*13 trustees */person_mentioned*who may [be] appointed yearly by the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento */person_mentioned*of Said Town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*; and the said *person_mentioned*trustees */person_mentioned*may appoint a *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*secretary */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*treasurer*/person_mentioned*, and shall employ all the *person_mentioned*teachers */person_mentioned*and make rules and regulations and Bye laws for the Government of said *location_mentioned*seminary */location_mentioned*and have the control of the funds belonging to it and appropriate the same for the use and benefit of said *location_mentioned*seminary*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*3—Untill there is an *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento */person_mentioned*at the said Town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* the above named *person_mentioned*trustees */person_mentioned*shall be appointed by *person_mentioned*S. F. A. the Judge*/person_mentioned* commissioned to administer the municipal government of said *location_mentioned*Town */location_mentioned*for the present—*/p*
*p*4—For the endowment of said *location_mentioned*Seminary */location_mentioned*with funds there is hereby granted to it the quantity of *location_mentioned*Six Leagues of land*/location_mentioned* to be selected by the said *person_mentioned*S. F. A*/person_mentioned*. in such size tracts as he may deem most advantageous and in any part of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*not otherwise disposed of *location_mentioned*East of the Colorado Rlver in Texas*/location_mentioned*— An entry of said selections shall be made in the *location_mentioned*archives of the new Colony on the Brasos and Colorado*/location_mentioned* at the said town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* and a certified copy therefor shall be sent to the *person_mentioned*Governor of this state*/person_mentioned* who shall file the same in his *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*as an evidence of said entries-—*/p*
*p*5. The said *location_mentioned*seminary */location_mentioned*shall form a Body Corporate under the name of the *location_mentioned*Seminary of Austin*/location_mentioned* and may have a seal and buy and Sell property and sue and be sued—*/p*
*p*6. The *person_mentioned*treasurer */person_mentioned*of said *location_mentioned*seminary */location_mentioned*shall publish annually an A/C of all the receipts and expenditures of said *location_mentioned*seminary */location_mentioned*for the information of the *person_mentioned*public*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
